identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a face-recognition photo platform that feels magical, not dystopian. Blend high-end photography aesthetics with SaaS precision.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Art Gallery' elegance with 'Fintech' precision.
Emotion First: The UI recedes; the photos are the heroes.
Content is King: Every screen is a frame for the user's memories.
Zoom In: Use bold focus on faces and details.
Negative Space: Luxurious padding to let photos breathe.

headings.usage: Landing page headlines, feature titles, modal headers. DO NOT use for dense data.

body.usage: Dashboard tables, form inputs, body text, metadata.
body.features: Excellent digit legibility for dates and stats.

accent.usage: Testimonials, 'Magical' moments (e.g., '3 photos found!'), empty states.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=Outfit:wght@500;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;600&display=swap');

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active states, brand moments.

rules: NO generic full-screen gradients. Use subtle noise textures.
Dark mode must be 'Obsidian' (#050505), not pure black.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with a 1px white/10 border.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric, artistic. Use col-span-full for hero images.
grid_system.dashboard: High Density Grid (Mode B). 12-column fluid grid. Sidebar fixed.
grid_system.gallery: Masonry Layout. Variable height images. Use 'columns-2 md:columns-3 lg:columns-4 gap-4'.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding.
spacing.containers: Max-width-7xl for marketing, Fluid for dashboard.

buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover: lift (hover:-translate-y-0.5).

cards.glass: For photo overlays: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md text-white border-white/20.

inputs.style: Tall (h-12). Minimal border. Focus: ring-2 ring-indigo-500/20 ring-offset-0.

navigation.marketing: Floating glass header (sticky top-4 mx-auto max-w-5xl rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-xl).
navigation.dashboard: Vertical sidebar. Dark mode by default for contrast with photos.

animations.scanning: A scanning line animation (cyan/indigo gradient) moving up/down over the selfie camera view.

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay or gradient fade.

attendee_selfie.usage: Feature section: 'For Attendees' / How it works.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glass_effects: Use for sticky headers, modal overlays, and photo metadata overlays.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use 'Aurora' gradients (blurred blobs of color) in the background of the Landing Page, NOT on buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-performance photo platform. Speed and aesthetics are paramount.
instructions_to_main_agent.frontend: Use React + Tailwind + Framer Motion. Ensure images load lazily (blur-up effect).
instructions_to_main_agent.backend: FastAPI. Focus on efficient batch processing for photo uploads.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts or default Tailwind colors.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
